Track your online time effortlessly with Epoch, a privacy-focused website time tracking extension that helps you understand your browsing habits.

Key Features:
• Clean, intuitive interface showing your daily website usage
• Detailed statistics for each website, including total time, daily averages, and usage patterns
• Easy date navigation to review past browsing history
• Dark/light theme support for comfortable viewing
• Privacy-first approach - all data stays local on your device
• Comprehensive dashboard for deeper insights into your browsing habits
• Real-time tracking with accurate timing down to the second

Perfect for:
• Productivity monitoring
• Understanding your online habits
• Time management

Epoch helps you make informed decisions about your online time without compromising your privacy. All tracking data is stored locally on your device and is never sent to external servers.

Note: This extension requires permissions to access tabs and storage to track website usage accurately.
